mapper.select: SELECT SHOP_NUM, SHOP_ID, SHOP_BRAND, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_TEL, SHOP_ADD, SHOP_POS1, SHOP_POS2, SHOP_JOIN_APPROVE, SHOP_DEL_GB, SHOP_START_TIME, SHOP_END_TIME FROM SHOP WHERE SHOP_NUM = #{SHOP_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOP SET SHOP_PW = #{SHOP_PW}, SHOP_TEL = #{SHOP_TEL}, SHOP_START_TIME = #{SHOP_START_TIME}, SHOP_END_TIME = #{SHOP_END_TIME}, SHOP_ADD = #{SHOP_ADD} WHERE SHOP_NUM = #{SHOP_NUM}
